content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I want to rebuild the relationship with someone but I hurt that person so deep. I feel so guilty.
I' m sorry to hear that. How has life been treating you lately?
Just as I say. I feel lonely and I need some connection.

That must be very difficult. I have been in the same situation recently and I know how hard it can be to reach out for help. I remember feeling lonely and feeling guilty when I was in a bad place. How long had you been in this position?
